'''Poisonous potato oil''' is a joke [[item]] added in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Refinement ===
Refining a [[poisonous potato]] in a [[potato refinery]] with a [[glass bottle]] in the bottle slot outputs 1 poisonous potato oil. This takes {{convert|125|ticks|seconds}} and grants {{experience|0.1}}.

[[File:Refining a poisonous potato into poisonous potato oil.png|300px]]

== Usage ==
To drink poisonous potato oil, press and hold {{control|use}} while it is selected in the hotbar. Drinking it gives the player [[It's very slippery]] effect for 1 tick and [[Poison]] for 10 seconds, and returns a [[glass bottle]].

Poisonous potato oil can ''not'' be used in the potato refinery to lubricate items like the non-poisonous oil variant.
